org.pimslims.business
Interface DataStorage

public interface DataStorage

This class should be used to store the details of accessing the underlying data store, so this might be a Hibernate Session, a PIMS Transaction, even a file handle according to what the implementation might require.... e.g. for platedb, we require two Hibernate Session variables for use: one for platedb and one for the generic User Management App database.

Author:
ian

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

openResources

void openResources(java.lang.String username)
                   throws BusinessException

This function will open any resources that will be used to store or retrieve data from a data source.

This may include opening a connection to that resource if it has not already been done

Parameters:
username -

The username of the user making the connection

Throws:
BusinessException -

Thrown if there is any type of failure within the function

openResources

void openResources(java.lang.String username,
                   boolean canReadAll,
                   boolean canWriteAll)
                   throws BusinessException
Parameters:
username -
canReadAll -
canWriteAll -
Throws:
BusinessException

closeResources

void closeResources()
                    throws BusinessException

This will close any resources that have been opened, however this does not include the termination of a connection (to say a database), to do this use the terminateResources function

Throws:
BusinessException -

Thrown if there is any type of failure within the function

connectResources

void connectResources()
                      throws BusinessException

This function will open any connections that are required by the implementation to data stores such as databases or files.

Throws:
BusinessException -

Thrown if there is any type of failure within the function

disconnectResources

void disconnectResources()
                         throws BusinessException

This function will completely close any connections that have been created to data stores such as databases or files.

Throws:
BusinessException -

Thrown if there is any type of failure within the function
